meanings.definition: Telemeters: devices used to measure distances or lengths
meanings.sent1: The telemeters helped the surveyors measure the field accurately.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used telemeters to calculate the distance between the planets.
meanings.sent3: The telemeters were so precise that they even measured the length of a tiny ant!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like telemeters, always accurately gauging the distance between objects.
meanings.sent5: The telemeters beeped softly as they recorded the exact length of the hallway.

meanings.definition: Telemeters: to measure distances or lengths using a telemeter
meanings.sent1: He telemeters the room before deciding on the furniture placement.
meanings.sent2: She telemeters the garden to plan the irrigation system.
meanings.sent3: The cat telemeters the distance to the treat before making a leap.
meanings.sent4: His mind telemeters back to the memories of childhood, measuring the years gone by.
meanings.sent5: The detective telemeters the crime scene, trying to reconstruct the events.
